text: Dangshi, zhenzhu yu zhong xianzhi diyue shuo:“Wo yi shangci nimen jingdian he zhihui, yihou you yige shizhe lai zhengshi nimen suoyou de jingdian, nimen bixu quexin ta, bixu fuzhu ta.” Ta shuo:“Nimen chengren ma?
